item.title: Please just a little help here
item.dc:creator: @jmaldon jmaldon
item.description:
@jmaldon wrote:

ok…i have moved it to the end of clickone…but im still having the same problem…it sux…

here it is…

[code]/clay/case 2109:if(HasItemAmount(1275, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1273, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1271, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1269, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1267, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1265, 1))))))){
if(playerLevel[14] >= 1) {
if (actionTimer == 0) {
actionAmount++;
addItem(434, 1);
actionTimer = 28;
PickAxeOwns();
addSkillXP((20playerLevel[14]), 14);
sendMessage(“you swing your pickaxe at the rock and you get some ore!”);}
else if(playerLevel[14] < 1) {
sendMessage(“you need at least 1 Mining to mine Clay!”);
}}}break;
/tin/case 2095:if(HasItemAmount(1275, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1273, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1271, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1269, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1267, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1265, 1))))))){
if(playerLevel[14] >= 1) {
if (actionTimer == 0) {
actionAmount++;
addItem(438, 1);
actionTimer = 28;
PickAxeOwns();
addSkillXP((25playerLevel[14]), 14);
sendMessage(“you swing your pickaxe at the rock and you get some ore!”);}
else if(playerLevel[14] < 1) {
sendMessage(“you need at least 1 mining to mine Tin!”);
}}}break;

/copper/case 2091: if(HasItemAmount(1275, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1273, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1271, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1269, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1267, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1265, 1))))))){
if(playerLevel[14] >= 1) {
if (actionTimer == 0) {
actionAmount++;
addItem(436, 1);
actionTimer = 28;
PickAxeOwns();
addSkillXP((25playerLevel[14]), 14);
sendMessage(“you swing your pickaxe at the rock and you get some ore!”);}
else if(playerLevel[14] < 1) {
sendMessage(“you need at least 1 Mining to mine Copper!”);
}}}break;
/iron/case 2093: if(HasItemAmount(1275, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1273, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1271, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1269, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1267, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1265, 1))))))){
if(playerLevel[14] >= 5) {
if (actionTimer == 0) {
actionAmount++;
addItem(440, 1);
actionTimer = 28;
PickAxeOwns();
addSkillXP((40playerLevel[14]), 14);
sendMessage(“you swing your pickaxe at the rock and you get some ore!”);}
else if(playerLevel[14] < 5) {
sendMessage(“you need at least 5 Mining to mine Iron!”);
}}}break;[/code]

item.title: Please just a little help here
item.dc:creator: @jmaldon jmaldon
item.description:
@jmaldon wrote:

i added this code for mining and it compiled perfectly, i have checked a million times and all ids are correct yet when i try to mine a rock(tin) with an iron pick axe nothing happens.it doesnt mine or give me an error…please help me out and look at this…

public void Mining() // 2090-2111 2119-2140 2704 3042 3043 3431 4676 6943-6948 { /*Mining Skill*/

/clay/if(HasItemAmount(1275, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1273, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1271, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1269, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1267, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1265, 1))))))){
if(playerLevel[14] >= 1) {
if (actionTimer == 0) {
actionAmount++;
addItem(434, 1);
actionTimer = 28;
PickAxeOwns();
addSkillXP((20playerLevel[14]), 14);
sendMessage(“you swing your pickaxe at the rock and you get some ore!”);}
else if(playerLevel[14] < 1) {
sendMessage(“you need at least 1 Mining to mine Clay!”);
}}}
/tin/else if(HasItemAmount(1275, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1273, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1271, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1269, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1267, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1265, 1))))))){
if(playerLevel[14] >= 1) {
if (actionTimer == 0) {
actionAmount++;
addItem(438, 1);
actionTimer = 28;
PickAxeOwns();
addSkillXP((25playerLevel[14]), 14);
sendMessage(“you swing your pickaxe at the rock and you get some ore!”);
}
else if(playerLevel[14] < 1) {
sendMessage(“you need at least 1 mining to mine Tin!”);
}}}

/copper/else if(HasItemAmount(1275, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1273, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1271, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1269, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1267, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1265, 1))))))){
if(playerLevel[14] >= 1) {
if (actionTimer == 0) {
actionAmount++;
addItem(436, 1);
actionTimer = 28;
PickAxeOwns();
addSkillXP((25playerLevel[14]), 14);
sendMessage(“you swing your pickaxe at the rock and you get some ore!”);}
else if(playerLevel[14] < 1) {
sendMessage(“you need at least 1 Mining to mine Copper!”);
}}}
/iron/else if(HasItemAmount(1275, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1273, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1271, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1269, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1267, 1) || (HasItemAmount(1265, 1))))))){
if(playerLevel[14] >= 5) {
if (actionTimer == 0) {
actionAmount++;
addItem(440, 1);
actionTimer = 28;
PickAxeOwns();
addSkillXP((40playerLevel[14]), 14);
sendMessage(“you swing your pickaxe at the rock and you get some ore!”);}
else if(playerLevel[14] < 5) {
sendMessage(“you need at least 5 Mining to mine Iron!”);
}}}
//end mining skill
}
